title: International Patients
subtitle: Comprehensive healthcare services for patients worldwide
heading: Welcome International Patients
intro: We specialize in providing world-class medical care to international patients, offering comprehensive support from consultation to recovery.

topConcerns.title: Top Concerns for Traveling Patients
topConcerns.subtitle: We understand your concerns and address each one with our comprehensive services
concerns: Identification and evaluation of hospitals and doctors for treatment.
Comprehensive coordination of travel, stay, treatment, recuperation etc.

Post Treatment Care and Follow up

stepByStepGuide.title: Your Step by Step Guide
stepByStepGuide.subtitle: Role of Panacea Medcare
stepByStepGuide.description: This can help future patients in their decision-making process.

steps.title: Research and Selection of Hospitals/Clinic
steps.description: You send the patients reports to us by email/whatsapp. Our expert team goes thru the reports and consults few hospitals/doctors who are best suited for that particular treatment also keeping in mind the budget of the patient.

steps.title: Consultation with Healthcare Providers
steps.description: We can also arrange video conference facility with the doctor to understand the procedure, recovery time, and any pre-treatment requirements. Basis the reports and consultation we Obtain a detailed treatment plan, including costs, expected duration etc.

steps.title: Visa and Travel Arrangements
steps.description: Panacea will arrange the Visa Invitation letter from the hospital and help in getting the visa from Indian Embassy in your country. Also Air tickets can be arranged if desired, by our travel partners at no extra charge.

steps.title: Accommodation and Local Transportation
steps.description: Panacea will arrange for pick up from the airport and all logistics for your stay at the hospital or stay during and after treatment for attendants and all local travel arrangements.

steps.title: Hospital Admission and Pre treatment
steps.description: Panacea will have its representative to assist you for admission in the hospital, pretreatment tests and diagnostics etc.

steps.title: Billing and Payment
steps.description: Panacea will assist you in settling the hospital bills/arrange for currency conversion or any other assistance regarding bill amount etc. We also ensure no hidden charges are billed to the patient and that the charges are as per the estimate submitted, except for extra procedures that may be required on case to case basis.

steps.title: Rehabilitation and Recovery
steps.description: Panacea will provide support for post-operative care and/or rehabilitation programs recommended by the hospital.

steps.title: Travel Back Home
steps.description: After a final check-up and clearance from the doctor, Panacea will help to get all your reports, book your flight back home. Panacea has several tie-ups for exploring the exotic locations in India, and we will assist you in the best possible way for sightseeing and shopping.

steps.title: Follow-Up from Home
steps.description: WE offer telemedicine services for follow-up at home for any further advice or treatment if required.

steps.title: Feedback and Testimonial
steps.description: Share your experience with the hospital and provide testimonials if you're satisfied with the care received.
